0x00000000.description: PCIe Component Internal Target Address Map through CPP Target
0x00000000.name: PcieInternalTargets

0x00000000.description: PCIe Component and PHY Configuration registers
0x00000000.name: PcieComponentCfgXpb

0x00010000.description: Error check and correct status registers for Queue Controller. See Peripheral ECC Monitor documentation for more details. Implemented using ecc_monitor macro.
0x00010000.name: PcieQueECC

0x00020000.description: Error check and correct status registers for Shared Memory SRAM accessed over XPB. See Peripheral ECC Monitor documentation for more details. Implemented using ecc_monitor4 macro.
0x00020000.name: PcieSramECC

0x00030000.description: Control and Status registers for Interrupt Manager accessed over XPB. See Interrupt Manager documentation for more details.
0x00030000.name: PcieIntMgr

0x00040000.description: Error check and correct status registers for WQ FIFO. See Peripheral ECC Monitor documentation for more details. Implemented using ecc_monitor macro.
0x00040000.name: PcieWQECC

0x00050000.description: Error check and correct status registers for ToPCIe DMA DESC FIFO. See Peripheral ECC Monitor documentation for more details. Implemented using ecc_monitor macro.
0x00050000.name: ToPCIeDMADescECC

0x00060000.description: Error check and correct status registers for FromPCIe DMA DESC FIFO. See Peripheral ECC Monitor documentation for more details. Implemented using ecc_monitor macro.
0x00060000.name: FromPCIeDMADescECC

0x00070000.description: Error check and correct status registers for PCIe Buffer Descriptor RAM. See Peripheral ECC Monitor documentation for more details. Implemented using ecc_monitor macro.
0x00070000.name: PCIeBDECC

0x00080000.description: Error check and correct status registers for PCIe Function Config Lookup Table RAM. See Peripheral ECC Monitor documentation for more details. Implemented using ecc_monitor macro.
0x00080000.name: PCIeCfgLutECC
